document_data.mainbody:
both Thornsteel was a Zhent mercenary leader in Mornbryns Shield sometime after the War of the Silver Marches.
Oboth was a Zhentarim mercenary in Yartar in the late 1480s or early 1490s DR.
Following a giants attack on the village of Mornbryns Shield, Oboth and his men occupied the village. First the villagers welcomed them but soon Oboth grow tyrannical and only interested in finding the lost treasure of Mornbryn.
